title: 820-3209 keeps chiming
message: Hi, ive got an 820-3209 that keeps chiming repeatedly even with everything disconnected , there is no signs of spillage anywhere the board is as clean as a whistle, so im pretty stuck as to where to start with this one , so any help would be appreciated

title: 820-3209 keeps chiming
message:
First try to start in SMC bypass.
Let see if still restarts.

title: 820-3209 keeps chiming
message: Nope , starts chiming as soon as i plug in the power supply, was wondering wether to relow smc incase of bad connection ?

title: 820-3209 keeps chiming
message:
Did you really try SMC bypass?
It cannot start by itself in the first 5s in such case...

title: 820-3209 keeps chiming
message: as far as i know i did, had to look it up on how to do it but apparently hold you finger on the power button for approx 20secs but didnt get that far, laptop started up within 3 - 4 secs

title: 820-3209 keeps chiming
message:
You must press power button (in the first instance), then connect charger and maintain button pressed 5-10s.
Did you do it like that?
